name: Gun Raiders
abstract: Gun Raiders is a free-to-play VR shooter!  Chat with friends while you mow down enemies in multiple game modes while jetpacking through the air or climbing from wall to wall monkey-style!

detail.app_release_note:
Patch 0.8.226 - Gun Raiders Mobile Open Beta

Exciting news today! We've just released our Gun Raiders mobile phone build. It's currently in Open Beta, which means it's still in the testing phase, but everyone can give it a try and even cross-play with VR players. Plus, we're introducing a brand new referral system where you can recommend new players and earn free Raider Coins.

- Mobile Beta Test: Android only for now, followed by iOS very soon.
- Shurikens are larger, and the spread pattern has been made smaller to increase ease of use.
- New Referral System: Refer new players and receive free Raider Coins!
- Wisp fuel is now unlimited in Battle Royale.
- Account linking allows you to log into one account from another account.
- Fixed some broken mesh areas in Murkwood.
- Multi-Control game mode has been added to player-created maps, Yard, and Deathvalley.
- Map Vote screen has been reduced to 14 random maps instead of all maps every time.
- Fixed map filter showing incorrect games.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
